website_summaries.verdict: A flush-able toilet to take camping that is lightweight and doesn't smell bad.
pros: Kids and adults can both use
Decent price compared to others on the market
cons: Not great for people who have a hard time getting down and up
Waste container is very heavy when full

customer_reviews.title: Everything is better about the Thetford we replaced this with.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I live 50 out of 52 weeks a year in a truck and probably put more use on a porta toilet than most. We purchased the premium small version and right out of the box the fresh water tank leaked. The valve opens on the side so you are limited to where you can use this and my biggest peave the black water tank won't stand on its end. I realize the Thetford 345 is more than twice the money but I can assure you its worth every penny. Its more comfortable to sit on, easier to clean and much easier to live with overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stainer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design. It leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after 3 months and maybe 5 uses. Used it for camping and it is always in the rv. Only time it moves is when it’s getting cleaned. Product leaks from the seals of the fresh water. Thankfully I caught it only an hour after it creates a huge puddle in the rv. This could have been catastrophic damage if water had gotten through the flooring. Since I am out of the return window, I can’t even get a replacement. Horrible experience, don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: READ the Instructions
customer_reviews.text: TIP: Put a 1/4 cup of bleach I'm the waste tank before use/after emptying. The pods don't always kill the bacteria and pressure build up WARNING: It builds pressure! It is sealed. Either altitude changes or bacteria can cause a violent volcano of crap if not operated according to the instructions. UPDATE:. A year later, it is no longer pressured and does smell. The side O ring blew due to pressure. NOTE: Purchasing the model with the front flush lever since the side lever requires more space. Use in a limited space van.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It leaked within 24 hours - was about halfway full
customer_reviews.text: Within 24 hours of occasional use by one person, it started leaking. It leaked on the seam of the reservoir (1/2way up the gray part). Looks like the 2 pieces weren't sealed together. It made a huge mess and I'm afraid to try a replacement. Oh, and now I have to mail the used thing back!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently the designer has never had to use one
customer_reviews.text: As a functional toilet it works BUT... the application is almost always in a tight space such as a boat or RV... this thing has no handles so you just kinda grab it and hope for the best and the flush mechanism is on the side instead of in the front... super hard to operate when the side is against a bulkhead....NOT USER FRIENDLY
customer_reviews.author: mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for our boat!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this portable toilet for our pontoon boat. We have had it for over a month now and have used it about 4 times. It works very well for us. It is easy to operate and take apart for cleaning. The three directional flush works very well and the swivel dumping elbow makes for easier cleaning. It seals very well and we have had no spills or smells. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Genrich

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but dumping/cleaning is tedious
customer_reviews.text: Overall works very well, strong flush action. Valve seals off odors very well. Nice compact size for storage in our pop-up camper. Disposal and cleaning out the lower tank took several tries to get everything. Apparently there are a number of nooks and crannies inside the waste tank for paper and solids to get trapped in. Multiple rinsing with water and turning the tank over finally got it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Gee

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver during covid
customer_reviews.text: Using this with a small pop up tent means that we never had to stop at a rest stop to "go". Very safe and easy to keep social distance. I recommend this to all. It also has a flush feature! Very superior to anything else i've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Virtue

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect advertised height.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking toilet with great reviews. However, the height listed on the description is incorrect. The height is actually 13.5 not 12.5 as advertised. The description did not include the pump handle height sticking out the top. Unfortunately, I will be returning the product because it will not slide into the space in my pop up. I wish I had the extra inch needed so I could keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Used on my last camping trip!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it about two weeks ago and used it once on my camping trip last week. I ordered this because my old porta potty was leaking. This one did not have any leaking problems and functioned as advertised. It was sturdy and easy to use too. I am recommending this to any campers. Since I only used it once, this is not the final review. I will update if I see any issues in future!
customer_reviews.author: ShapedUSA Helper

customer_reviews.title: Basic but very helpful in the right place.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet functions well. It is a bit heavy when full of water and a bit low to the ground. Cleaning is a bit cumbersome but under the circumstances works ok for a unit like this. For the price it is to be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spender

customer_reviews.title: compact for a pop up camper.
customer_reviews.text: First one I returned because the drain cap leaked since the cap was misthreaded.....Check yours! I put some water in my second one, and everything seemed to work fine. Only 4 stars because I haven't used it camping yet. Will up grade my response after June 2018..
customer_reviews.author: Waneiac

customer_reviews.title: No spills!
customer_reviews.text: Pull the lever when disconnecting the holding tank to avoid spills and you’ll get a de luxe german worthy ride
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase!!!! My wife and I are very pleased with this. Have it in my camper van that im building. Only using it for just pee. Emptying the toilet is easy, I’m glad to have bought the 2.6 gallon. Its low in height but im going to build a stand/box to make it a bit taller and store it away when we dont need it.
customer_reviews.author: emem

customer_reviews.title: RUN AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet was purchased and seemed to work fine. Then the cracks appeared. The 'holding tank' cracked. THE TANK THAT THE WASTE IS HELD CRACKED!!! AND LEAKED!!! POOR quality! Back to Thetford Toilets!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, plastic cracks after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Hairline cracks along holding tank after the first three months of very minimal, inside, air conditioned boat cabin. Complete garbage. Feel really ripped off of $86.
customer_reviews.author: Shoofly Pie

customer_reviews.title: It serves its purpose. Flushes well.9
customer_reviews.text: Well made as long as you can get the potty seperated from the holding tank. Sometimes hzngs up. But still a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Needs a hood ornament like a Mercedes!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect device!!! Love it. Neat, clean, easy to use, lifesaver. I don’t fill the clean water with as much as the day since it’s pretty heavy. I also don’t put tp in the bottom. Was so afraid of emptying it but the orange sanitation pack makes it not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gi

customer_reviews.title: have not used YET
customer_reviews.text: got this for the boat to fit under a cabin bench. very compact. to use when needed. seems well built and very nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy flush valve gaskets/leaked
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for camping. Only took on two trips, and flush valve quit working correctly and leaked chemical. This portable toilet was stored in a heated garage when not in use, and was maintained properly. Ended up returning and reordering a different brand. Otherwise, would be a good travel toilet, if Camco would improve poor quality flush valve. Gaskets made of very flimsy rubber. Amazon return service was very efficient and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: pfox

customer_reviews.title: It works ok but I wish it was completly sealed ...
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but I wish it was completly sealed. The fill cap has a vent hole that stays open all the time so don't fill it all the way up with water in the holding tank. Also make sure you open the flush valve before doing your business or you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: smily

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I had a porta potty for camping that needed replacement. I use this in my rv for during the night instead of going in my camper toilet because we camp for extended periods without being able to dump our waste. This toilet did not disappoint . It gets the job done. Easy to take apart for dumping. I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: No more middle of the night bathroom hikes while camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for camping. It worked great and felt sturdy to use. We only used it for #1, and it was easy to empty. Comes with deodorizer samples. It was so nice to not have to walk through the camp ground in the middle of the night to take my children to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: M36Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product. Cleaning takes a little more effort than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning took some shaking, maybe I needed to fill more with water. A little awkward to remove from boat and then detach and carry in the house but that’s what I should have expected for a portable toilet
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: It leaked and we had to jettison it on it's first use.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it started leaking mixed "fluids" as soon as it was used for the first time. We threw it in a dump along the way so that our rig wasn't covered in "fluids."
customer_reviews.author: shoblime

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The quality was less than I expected after so many good reviews. The entire perimeter seam leaked and the plastic felt cheap. Good design. Poor workmanship and materials.
customer_reviews.author: JeanD

customer_reviews.title: Great small portable toilet for camping
customer_reviews.text: Good cassette toilet. I used it in my truck while dry camping. I liked the compact size. It is easy to used. I followed instructions for usage and cleaning, no problems. The best buy for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Clear Moon

customer_reviews.title: This actually "Flushes" like a real toilet !!!  LOL
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters think that's funny and wants to use the item - camping / emergencies :o)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work right after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: worked good for a couple of months then it didn't seal properly between the pieces and leaked in my vehicle, the pump seemed to lose its prime and the"flush handle" is hard to pull out. The only thing good about it is that it fits in my truck
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Good to avoid public restrooms on a road trip
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for a road trip of family vacation, in order to avoid using public restrooms during Covid-19 pandemic. It fits well into the back part of our minivan. It is easy to use and clean. The only accident we had was due to the pressure difference between the upper and lower parts, when we drove to higher elevation.
customer_reviews.author: Xiuyan Yin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Little difficult to take apart to empty and clean. But worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is great pontoon porta potty. Works great. My only complaint is it's a little low. Had to stick a milk crate under it and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schorn

customer_reviews.title: dimensions are wrong for this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as it gave a height of 12.5", which would just fit where it needs to go on pontoon boat. Now that summer is almost here I tried to put it on the boat and realized the pump extends makes the height over 13". Since I ordered this at Xmas I cannot return the item and have to be a different porta-potti. Lets hope the dimensions are correct on the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ela

customer_reviews.title: Bad support/Was a good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but the pump is broken and I have only used it a couple of times:( They are based in Thailand so getting support has been quite a hassle. Still waiting on a response:(
customer_reviews.author: Jlynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this toilet
customer_reviews.text: Love this toilet! This is a must when we camp. It worked for me, my hubby, and four boys for a weekend of camping. My only problem is that my two younger kids loved it so much they kept needing to use the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scott And Tiffany Ede

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great to have during COVID! No one lets you use the bathroom when you’re on long drives! Thank you very much! Fits right in the trunk and great for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and price
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. Yes. This is amazing Great for camping, emergency and daily use. Everybody needs one. I had to fix the o ring, was easy tho with a hard long object.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great potty!
customer_reviews.text: Great potty! No smells. Just don’t be stupid by dumping it in your home after vacation😝🤪! Make sure you empty it at a dump site.
customer_reviews.author: MarshmallowFluffPanda

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic changed my mind
customer_reviews.text: I returned this one in favor of a more expensive model (from Thetford). The hard plastic felt like it could more easily crack, if only with age. I'd rather pay more to avoid a sewage leak in my van. For the price, though, and from appearances this seemed to be a good toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No midnight trips thru campground in dark
customer_reviews.text: Well what does one say about a toilet? It is handy to have in your tent in the dark of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Globetrekkengrama

customer_reviews.title: works great for emergency doo doos
customer_reviews.text: Holds odors in perfectly, works great for emergency doo doos. I'd caution that you should pull the flush lever before starting your business so you don't chop said business in half making for much more of a clean up chore....
customer_reviews.author: majorsmackdown

customer_reviews.title: Good simple camping toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Good night time use in our camper. Flush action is good and is easy to empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Tu

customer_reviews.title: Very economical.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this toilet long but it seems very well made. I will update if any defects develop.
customer_reviews.author: MR GUY

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough, Better than others. Bigger Seat.
customer_reviews.text: Better, Bigger seat than the other ones. The plastic feels like it could crack though. Probably won't. Just seems a bit hardened.
customer_reviews.author: Monkle124

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For The "Changing Room" On Our Pontoon Boat
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product. 2.6 gallons sound like a lot but it doesn't take long to fill it up. I'd go with the bigger one if I were to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JohnR.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I have caulked this potty on all the seams. I still find it magically leaks 🤔. I’ll probab get a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Used it maybe 10 times, then it had a huge leak on the floor. There is something with the seal And how it connects the two halves of this unit. Also the pump holder came off and there were small leaks here and there since day one. Out of the return window so not sure what to do with this thing now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing for camping! No more crawling out of the tent in the middle of the night. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and empty!
customer_reviews.text: Made a recent 10 day road trip much more pleasant for everyone! Easy to empty, easy to fill and fits in the space of a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to have when camping
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use when you NEED to go and the camper doesn't have bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I got the 2.5 gal. Just the right size doesn't take up a lot of room. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Deeds

customer_reviews.title: When nature places the call, this is the answer.
customer_reviews.text: What a great sitting device. Works easily and easy to clean. I have it in my deer blind and is a life saver when nature calls.
customer_reviews.author: Stevemtexas

customer_reviews.title: Great Price on a Great Product... love it
customer_reviews.text: Really Happy with this purchase.. Pretty sturdy considering its plastic, reasonable to clean, altho I wish it could self clean, and really easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rudkin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for our pop up camper and was easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: StarrMom

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and mostly as described
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and mostly as described. It is very low and not as easy for anyone with any physical immobility issues. Also the latch is not spring-loaded, at least on mine you must manually pull it out and push back in to flush. Heavy! When full!
customer_reviews.author: Arab-elle Dere

customer_reviews.title: Good Toilet
customer_reviews.text: We love the toilet, only bad thing was the citrus powder came leaking in the box, otherwise all looked good. Will report back if anything changes :)
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing travel toilet! I keep it in my travel trailer/camper.. can't smell a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jude A

customer_reviews.title: What’s crapper
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping and comfortable for that quiet morning time moment!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our Expedition on road trips. Never leaks but is kind of a pain to clean with such a small hole to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: sunflowerkate

customer_reviews.title: Simple and clean
customer_reviews.text: Loved this once I used it. Easy to manage and keep clean. Much better than vault or pit toilets! Pretty simple to maneuver overall. Im liking it
customer_reviews.author: sundog323

customer_reviews.title: Cant understand all the good feedback, I went for it though
customer_reviews.text: Cant understand all the good feedback, I went for it though. This is the cheapest piece of crap in the world, pump leaks out of the box.... Toilet itself is super thin cheap plastic... The flush handle is on the side so in my boat , it wont open all the way...
customer_reviews.author: glenn h.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. Easy to use,clean, and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Collins

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind when nature calls.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and convenient in the pop up camper—fits under the bed for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Use bleach after every clean to keep the smell out!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever!!! My husband is a truck driver and I love going with him, this has been a great purchase, easy to clean and easy to store away..
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Use it for boating
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it on the boat. Portable and easy to stow while on the water.
customer_reviews.author: jonni27

customer_reviews.title: When you gotta go...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fits perfectly on my boat. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Hibler

customer_reviews.title: Economical, easy to dump.
customer_reviews.text: Using for my homebuilt camper. I live in camper Sunday night through Friday am as I work almost 100 miles from home.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Unit was compact and easy to store on my boat
customer_reviews.text: Unit was compact and easy to store on my boat. Functions well. Have not found anything I don't like so far.
customer_reviews.author: LC Man

customer_reviews.title: Leeks all over
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but unfortunately the one that I received was leaking from the hand pop as well as between the top and bottom tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Parker

customer_reviews.title: How to empty without spilling.  Make sure you read instruction.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for camping. I wish I had one when my children were small. Would be great for potty training or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this unit is the perfect size for mini van camper !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suprize
customer_reviews.text: Slide valve is on the right side of the toilet
customer_reviews.author: kevin klemm

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. Don't go camping with out it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I could have brought.
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my truck over the road and its great.
customer_reviews.author: pop

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The elbow in the dump pipe makes it hard to empty and very hard to clean. If I can unload (no pun intended) this thing I'm going to get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: JMG Leduc

customer_reviews.title: Makes camping so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for short camping trips. Needs to be emptied about every 2 days. Easy to empty, and not as horrific a job as I originally anticipated. I add Aqua Kem and use tissue sold for RVs. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: The lever to empty water tank into the waste tank is on the side
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not suitable for most of the boats. The lever to empty water tank into the waste tank is on the side, not on the front. In a boat you dont have the space on the side to pull the lever.
customer_reviews.author: FLORENCIO FONTECILLA

customer_reviews.title: So convenient to have when off-roading.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for off-road trips, and easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: gooeytek

product_meta.title: Camco Premium Portable Travel Toilet | 2.6 gallon | Three Directional Flush and Swivel Dumping Elbow (41535)
product_meta.description: The Camco Camping Toilet is a durable, comfortable option for camping, hunting, road trips and boat trips. The top features a larger seat size than most competitors, with an increased bowl size. The fresh water holding tank utilizes a pump flush action to effectively rinse the bowl of the toilet. The 2. 6 gallon detachable holding tank seals firmly to prevent escaping leaks and odors. The interior of the holding tank has a slick surface to make waste removal easier and more efficient. Remove the flush tank one handed by toggling a single locking latch. The latch is spring-loaded for automatic re-attachment. The Camco Camping Toilet features a lid that can be latched closed for easier transport or completely removed for cleaning. It is made of durable ABS resin and will seal in unpleasant odors for an overall better camping toilet experience. Measures 12. 5"H x 16" W x 17"D and weighs 11lbs when empty and 42. 5 lbs when full. The outside width of the seat measures 12. 6" the inside width is 8. 4". Patented.
feature_bullets: 2. 6 gallon detachable holding tank; 3. 75 gallon flush tank
Sliding gate valve seals in odors and won't leak
Interior surface made of slick ABS material that helps prevent odors from clinging and makes clean up easy
Pumping flush action cleans the bowl and the swivel dumping elbow makes waste removal easy
Measures 12. 5" H x 16" W x 17" D and weighs 11 lbs when empty and 42. 5 lbs when full

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
